BRP.actualENCHint: ENC value adjusted for being worn, hit location etc
BRP.apHint: Use tooltip to see Ballistic Armour Points.   For rolling Random Armour Values click the formula, or shift+click to roll Ballistic Armour
BRP.armBalHint: This armour will provide different protection to firearms
BRP.armHPLHint: This type of armour is not compatible with Hits Per Location rules
BRP.armourNoHitLoc: You must select an hit location for this armour
BRP.armourNotHPL: This armour is not compatible with Hits Per Location
BRP.armVarHint: The user can vary the amount of armour points - genereally used for Energy Shields
BRP.baseScoreHint: Select 'Fixed' for no rule in the relevant characterstic and multiple
BRP.basicHint: Starter skills will be automatically added to new characters if option activated
BRP.bleedingHint: Your character is bleeding - depending on the location and severity of the wound they may have some time before loosing hit points
BRP.bonusHint: Number in brackets is the Mental category bonus.  This is not included in the total value
BRP.charHint: Click the characteristic score for a normal roll (SHIFT + click to roll average difficulty/no mods), CTRL + click for a resistance roll, ALT + click for POW v POW roll.
BRP.chooseHitLoc: Please choose the hit location for this armour
BRP.chosenHint: Toggle this on if you have selected a specialism for the skill
BRP.dailyHP: Damage taken towards next minor wound
BRP.damagePrompt: Please enter the amount of damage taken
BRP.deadHint: Your character has died from a single massive blow to the head, chest or abdomen
BRP.diffValHint: Enter the difficulty mutliplier e.g 2 for 2 * skill chance or 2 * characteristic
BRP.dupItem: Can not add this item as it already exists on the sheet
BRP.energyHint: Current Energy Points and Maximum Energy Points
BRP.equipStatusHint: Toggle the item to move between Carried, Worn, Packed and Stored
BRP.errorCardInvalid: This Card Type is not recognised
BRP.errorRollInvalid: This Roll Type is not recognised
BRP.groupHint: A group of skills for professions and personalities
BRP.handCrewHint: Hands needed for all weapons, except Artillery which is number of crew
BRP.head: Head
BRP.healPrompt: Please enter the amount of damage healed
BRP.hitLocFractionHint: Enter 3 for 1/3, 4 for 1/4, 5 for 1/5, 10 for 1/10 and 2.5 for 2/5
BRP.hitLocTypeHint: Use limb for arms, legs, wings.  General is for non-locational damage
BRP.hpApHint: HP for all weapons, except AP for Shields
BRP.hpAdjHint: Adjust the hit points in hit location, use a negative number to reduce.  Does not impact total HP
BRP.impactHint: Amount of damage or healing depending on the spell
BRP.incapacitatedHint: Your character is incapacitated and can no longer fight.  If this is a limb you may try to heal yourself, if a chest wound you can not perform any actions.
BRP.injuredHint: The limb is temporarily useless.  If a leg or abdomen wound your character falls prone, if an arm you drop anything held and not attached.
BRP.injuredHPL: Injured limb = unusable, injured abdomen = can't use legs, injured head/chest = incapacitated
BRP.keyHint: Keywords are used to allow coding of impacts of the skill/item etc
BRP.levelHint: This is the level of the spell, or the maximum level for a variable spell
BRP.lock: Double click to lock/unlock the actor sheet
BRP.locTypeHint: Body locations result in death if there's 3 times the max HP, otherwise it's a limb and is severed in these circumstances
BRP.memHint: Spell is memorised when book is a solid colour
BRP.minorOnlyHint: This mutation is limited to minor power only
BRP.name: Name
BRP.needPower: You can't add this item without the relevant power
BRP.noAlleg: Allegiances are not allowed - see the game settings
BRP.noPassion: Passions are not allowed - see the game settings
BRP.nopower: This power is not allowed - see the game settings
BRP.noXPHint: Successfully using this skill does not grant an XP check
BRP.perLvlHint: CP reward is multiplied by superpower level if active
BRP.ppCostHint: Total MP/PP to cast the current/memorised level of the spell
BRP.ppplHint: PP/MP cost per level of the spell, power etc
BRP.radiusHint: Damage is reduced by 1D6 for each radius from the blast point
BRP.rangePsyHint: Range is multiplied by users POW
BRP.resolveMax: Maximum rolls added, please resolve the card
BRP.resolveMore: There needs to be 2 participants to resolve this roll
BRP.scoreExcHint: This percentage excludes the category bonus
BRP.scoreIncHint: This percentage includes the category bonus
BRP.selectPower: Please select the type of power
BRP.skillHint: Click the skill score for a normal roll (SHIFT + click to roll average difficulty/no mods), CTRL + click for an oppossed roll, ALT + click for a combined roll.
BRP.skillModHint: Penalty to Manipulation/Perception/Physical/both Hide & Stealth skills
BRP.specGroupHint: When used via an Optional Skill Group in a Profession or Personality this will let you select one of all skills in the Skill Category
BRP.specialismHint: There are specialism of this skill - change the skill name to reflect the specialism
BRP.spellCost: This is the permanent POW cost in addition to the power/magic point cost
BRP.spellLvlHint: Number if parenthesis is level of spell memorised where this is a variable level spell
BRP.stopPersonality: This character already has a Personality
BRP.stopProfession: This character already has a Profession
BRP.stopGroupSkill: You can not add a Group Skill to the sheet
BRP.title: Title
BRP.unconsciousHint: Your character is knocked unconscious and must receive medical attention.
BRP.variableHint: Toggle this on to choose rules that determine base skill chance
BRP.viewStat: Double click to toggle between NPC and base stats
BRP.weaponNeedsSkill: Please assign a combat skill to this weapon before adding it to a character
BRP.woundHint: Treated wounds are black, untreated wounds are in red italics
BRP.woundTreated: This wound has already been treated

Settings.allowImpHint: Allow Impossible Rolls, which only succeed on a roll of 01
Settings.autoXPHint: Automatically tick XP checks when successful
Settings.backgroundHint: Title of this character background section
Settings.charSheetLogoHint: Select the logo to sit at the centre top of the character sheet
Settings.diffValueHint: Enter the difficulty mutliplier of rolls rather than selecting a level
Settings.hpModHint: For Characters: 1 = default, 1.5 increases HP by 50%, 2 = Double
Settings.resistLevelsHint: When active resistance rolls can be critical, special and fumbles
Settings.resistRollHint: When active there is always a 1% chance of success or failure
Settings.skillBonusHint: Select no bonus, simple (prime characteristic) calc or advanced method
Settings.starterSkillsHint: Add starter skills to new characters on creation
Settings.switchShiftHint: When on this causes check rolls to default to no dialogue box.
Settings.useAVRandHint: Uses random armour values (e.g. 1D6 instead of fixed value)
Settings.useEDUHint: Characters will have an EDU characteristic
Settings.useFPHint: Characters will have a Fatigue Points score
Settings.useHPLHint: Tick this to use Hits Per Location
Settings.useMagicHint: Tick this to allow characters to have Magic spells
Settings.useMPHint: Power Points will be called Magic Points
Settings.useMutationHint: Tick this to allow characters to have Mutations
Settings.usePassionHint: Tick this to allow characters to have Passions
Settings.usePsychicHint: Tick this to allow characters to have Pyschic powers
Settings.useSANHint: Characters will have a SAN score
Settings.useSorceryHint: Tick this to allow characters to have Sorcery spells
Settings.useSuperHint: Tick this to allow characters to have Super-powers
Settings.xpFixedHint: Fixed increase when an XP improvement succeeds
Settings.xpFormulaHint: Dice to roll when an XP improvement succeeds
